text.title: South African TV journalist mugged while preparing for live broadcast
text.head: South African TV journalist mugged while preparing for live broadcast
Sources

list.item: "South Africa TV presenter Vuyo Mvoko mugged on camera" — BBC News Online , March 11, 2015
